TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit CardEmulation extends Java.Lang.Object
Public NotInheritable Class CardEmulation Inherits Object
public ref class CardEmulation sealed : Java::Lang::Object

Docs.summary: This class can be used to query the state of NFC card emulation services.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Activity action: ask the user to change the default card emulation service for a certain category.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance bool CategoryAllowsForegroundPreference(string category) cil managed
Public Function CategoryAllowsForegroundPreference (category As String) As Boolean

Docs.param: The category, e.g. #CATEGORY_PAYMENT
Docs.summary: Returns whether the user has allowed AIDs registered in the specified category to be handled by a service that is preferred by the foreground application, instead of by a pre-configured default.
Docs.returns: whether AIDs in the category can be handled by a service specified by the foreground app.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: public bool IsDefaultServiceForAid (Android.Content.ComponentName? service, string? aid);
.method public hidebysig instance bool IsDefaultServiceForAid(class Android.Content.ComponentName service, string aid) cil managed
Public Function IsDefaultServiceForAid (service As ComponentName, aid As String) As Boolean

Docs.param: The ComponentName of the service
The ISO7816-4 Application ID
Docs.summary: Allows an application to query whether a service is currently the default handler for a specified ISO7816-4 Application ID.
Docs.returns:
whether the service is the default handler for the specified AID

Requires the android.Manifest.permission#NFC permission.

MemberSignature.Value: public bool IsDefaultServiceForCategory (Android.Content.ComponentName? service, string? category);
.method public hidebysig instance bool IsDefaultServiceForCategory(class Android.Content.ComponentName service, string category) cil managed
Public Function IsDefaultServiceForCategory (service As ComponentName, category As String) As Boolean

Docs.param: The ComponentName of the service
The category
Docs.summary: Allows an application to query whether a service is currently the default service to handle a card emulation category.
Docs.returns:
whether service is currently the default service for the category.

Requires the android.Manifest.permission#NFC permission.

Public Function RemoveAidsForService (service As ComponentName, category As String) As Boolean

Docs.param: The component name of the service
The category of the AIDs to be removed, e.g. #CATEGORY_PAYMENT

Docs.returns: whether the group was successfully removed.

Docs.summary: Retrieves the route destination for the preferred payment service.
Docs.value: The route destination secure element name of the preferred payment service. HCE payment: "Host" OffHost payment: 1. String with prefix SIM or prefix eSE string. Ref: GSMA TS.26 - NFC Handset Requirements TS26_NFC_REQ_069: For UICC, Secure Element Name SHALL be SIM[smartcard slot] (e.g. SIM/SIM1, SIM2… SIMn). TS26_NFC_REQ_070: For embedded SE, Secure Element Name SHALL be eSE[number] (e.g. eSE/eSE1, eSE2, etc.). 2. "OffHost" if the payment service does not specify secure element name.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: public bool SetOffHostForService (Android.Content.ComponentName service, string offHostSecureElement);
.method public hidebysig instance bool SetOffHostForService(class Android.Content.ComponentName service, string offHostSecureElement) cil managed
Public Function SetOffHostForService (service As ComponentName, offHostSecureElement As String) As Boolean

Docs.param: The component name of the service

Secure Element to register the AID to. Only accept strings with prefix SIM or prefix eSE. Ref: GSMA TS.26 - NFC Handset Requirements TS26_NFC_REQ_069: For UICC, Secure Element Name SHALL be SIM[smartcard slot] (e.g. SIM/SIM1, SIM2… SIMn). TS26_NFC_REQ_070: For embedded SE, Secure Element Name SHALL be eSE[number] (e.g. eSE/eSE1, eSE2, etc.).
Docs.summary: Sets the off-host Secure Element for the given service.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: public bool SetPreferredService (Android.App.Activity? activity, Android.Content.ComponentName? service);
.method public hidebysig instance bool SetPreferredService(class Android.App.Activity activity, class Android.Content.ComponentName service) cil managed
Public Function SetPreferredService (activity As Activity, service As ComponentName) As Boolean

Docs.param: The activity which prefers this service to be invoked
The service to be preferred while this activity is in the foreground
Docs.summary: Allows a foreground application to specify which card emulation service should be preferred while a specific Activity is in the foreground.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.
